children.text:
Tariff "Passenger economy"

A trip along the route within the city administrative boundary (city trips)

Minimum price of a trip is 10.00 грн., including 1.0 km of a route, each successive kilometre 5.00 грн./km.If the route around the city is longer than 7 km, each extra kilometre costs 15.00 грн. If the route around the city is longer than 8 km, each extra kilometre costs 5.00 грн. Extras for an advance order: 0.00 грн. 
Free waiting time: 5 min.


Timed trip within the city administrative boundary (city trips)

Price of a trip is 70.00 грн. for 1 h., including 10 km of the route, each successive kilometre 5.00 грн./km.. The first hour shall be paid in full. Extras for an advance order: 0.00 грн. 
Free waiting time: 5 min.


A trip along the route outside the city administrative border (intercity transportation)

Minimum price of a trip is 20.00 грн..
The price of one-way trip is calculated on the basis of 7.00 грн./km
The price of a round trip is calculated on the basis of 3.50 грн./km
Extras for an advance order: 0.00 грн. 
Free waiting time: 5 min.


Extra charges for additional services *

Waiting time in minutes - 0.50 грн.Cost increase - 5.00 грн.Luggage - 5.00 грн.I'll go with children - 0.00 грн.Transportation of animals - 10.00 грн.
*calculated basing on:
First 5 waiting minutes are free
extra charge amount + route price
When there is no route, the sum includes the extra charge amount + the minimum trip price
